description.en: Magic Stone that adds 20% Wind Attack to your Weapon. The Weapon must have Wind Element.
description.ar: Magic Stone that adds 20% Wind Attack to your Weapon. The Weapon must have Wind Element.
description.br: Pedra Mágica que acrescenta 20% de Ataque de Vento. A arma deve ter o Elemento de Vento.
description.cns: 提升武器20%风属性攻击力的魔法石。武器必须有风属性。
description.de: Magischer Stein, der den Windangriff deiner Waffe um 20% erhöht. Die Waffe muss das Windelement besitzen.
description.fi: Magic Stone that adds 20% Wind Attack to your Weapon. The Weapon must have Wind Element.
description.fil: Magic Stone that adds 20% Wind Attack to your Weapon. The Weapon must have Wind Element.
description.fr: Pierre Divine ajoutant à votre arme 20% d'attaque de Vent. Votre arme doit avoir un élément de Vent.
description.id: Magic Stone yang menambahkan 20% Serangan Angin ke Senjatamu. Senjata harus memiliki Elemen Angin.
description.it: Magic Stone that adds 20% Wind Attack to your Weapon. The Weapon must have Wind Element.
description.jp: 風属性攻撃力を20％強化するマジックストーン。武器には「風」の属性が必要です。
description.kr: 바람 속성 공격력을 20% 상승시키는 마법의 돌. 무기는 반드시 바람 속성이 있어야 한다.
description.nl: Magic Stone that adds 20% Wind Attack to your Weapon. The Weapon must have Wind Element.
description.pl: Magic Stone that adds 20% Wind Attack to your Weapon. The Weapon must have Wind Element.
description.ru: Magic Stone that adds 20% Wind Attack to your Weapon. The Weapon must have Wind Element.
description.sp: Piedra Mágica que otorga Daño de Viento +20% a tu Arma. El Arma debe tener Elemento de Viento.
description.sw: Magic Stone that adds 20% Wind Attack to your Weapon. The Weapon must have Wind Element.
description.th: หินวิเศษที่เพิ่มWind Attack 20% ให้กับอาวุธของคุณ อาวุธต้องมีธาตุลม
description.tw: 為武器增加20%風屬性攻擊的魔法石。 武器須有風屬性。
description.vi: Magic Stone tăng thêm 20% Wind Attack cho Vũ khí của bạn. Vũ khí phải có Nguyên tố gió.
